    • Method Detail

      • addItem

        public void addItem(Product product,
                    int amount)
             throws java.lang.Exception
        Add an item to the list or increment the amount of the item if the related item already exists. The incrementation of 1 is meant for use with the product scanner. Throws Exception if amount of this item is bigger then the stock of the product it represents.
        Parameters:
        product - the product that is used
        amount - the amount you want to use
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if amount of this item is bigger then the stock of the product it represents

      • removeItem

        public void removeItem(Item item)
        Removes an item from the purchaseList and subtracts the amount from the subtotal.
        Parameters:
        item - the item you want to remove from the purchaseList

      • setItemAmount

        public void setItemAmount(Item item,
                          int amount)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Sets the item amount to a new value, the subtotal will be updated for the amount changed.
        Parameters:
        item - the item to be changed
        amount - the new amount
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - when the new item amount isn't left in stock

      • cancelPurchase

        public void cancelPurchase()
        Clears the purchaseList to cancel the purchase.

      • finishPurchase

        public void finishPurchase()
        Finishes the purchase, reduces the stock returns the subtotal and clears the purchaseList.

      • getSubtotal

        public double getSubtotal()
        Returns the subtotal of the purchaseList.
        Returns:
        the subtotal of the purchaseList

      • subtractSubtotal

        public void subtractSubtotal(double subtractValue)
        Subtracts the value from the subtotal.
        Parameters:
        subtractValue - the value to subtract from the subtotal

      • addSubtotal

        public void addSubtotal(double addValue)
        Adds the value to the subtotal.
        Parameters:
        addValue - the value to add to the subtotal

      • getPurchaseList

        public java.util.ArrayList<Item> getPurchaseList()
        Returns the purchaseList.
        Returns:
        the purchaseList
